short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: All Your Favorite Social Accounts In One Tab!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
My Social Circle keeps your favorite social messengers in one place. Stay connected and manage your accounts more efficiently from the comfort of this browser extension. From WhatsApp to YouTube, access your it all in one place with ease along with a search box to browse the internet.

How to get started:
My Social Circle is a browser extension which is integrated into Chrome to provide users access your social media accounts in one place. Once installed, enjoy swapping between your favorite apps, in the same new tab!
Note: This extension does not store or share any personal information, financial details, or authentication permissions.

Features:
Safe and secure access to WhatsApp, Pinterest, YouTube and more
Customized web search powered by Bing.com
Clean navigation between apps

Permissions
It  needs permission to allow a new tab to display the My Social Circle extension with the features including access to messenger apps and  customised search. 

Uninstallation:
To uninstall the "My Social Circle" extension in Chrome, go to chrome://extensions/ and locate "My Social Circle", click on the Remove option and you will be prompted with a pop up "Remove My Social Circle?", click the Remove button and the extension will get uninstalled.

By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to install the "My Social Circle" extension and hereby agree to set Chrome New Tab to that provided by the service and the Privacy Policy and Terms of Use.

Please refer to our Privacy Policy (https://semp.com/privacy-policy) and Terms of Use (https://semp.com/terms/) or contact us at contact@semp.com for any queries.

Disclaimer: My Social Circle is not a part of any of the applications or messengers added in this extension including WhatsApp, Facebook, Instagram,YouTube and the others. It is an unofficial app (browser add-on) and an independent project, and functions only as a toolbar extension that has been created to ensure that messenger services and the search box can be accessed and used at ease. Please, refer to our Privacy Policy for more details on the purpose and methods of our handling user data. 
The search engine on the new tab will change to Bing.com once downloaded.
This extension does NOT ask for your login or password, only the applications on this extension require your credentials to login in a secure manner.
